title: Generalize results of beetroot juice experiment

content.question: Based on the design of the investigation, which of the following is the largest population to which the results can be generalized?

choices.label: The <math alttext="25" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>25</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> student athletes assigned to the beetroot juice group
The <math alttext="50" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>50</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> student athletes in the sample
All student athletes at the college

content.answer: All student athletes at the college

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Interpret statistical calculations and findings to assign meaning or assess a claim.
